segments.text: I feel a pang of sympathy for the woman; she's so focused on her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks quite diligent, carefully drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the watery disaster unfolding at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, those cunning children are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be exhausting to be a parent, even if she's currently oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression shows no hint of the chaos surrounding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Soon, her peaceful moment will be rudely interrupted by a flood or a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little sad for her unsuspecting state.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll have quite a shock when she finally realizes everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet moment is fleeting, about to be replaced by stress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of how often we miss things right under our noses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could somehow give her a gentle heads-up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just seems to be doing her best.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a tough situation for her, even if she doesn't know it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
